Interface IErrorView

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdminUI, AdminView, LoginUI, LoginView

      void hideError()
      Clears current error message and hides the error fields.

    • Method Detail

      • isError

        boolean isError()
        Returns:
        True, if the form is showing an error message. Otherwise, false.

        Sets and shows the error fields with error message.
        Parameters:
        errorMsg - Error message to be displayed to the user.

        Clears current error message and hides the error fields.
